A curated selection of recent and not-so-recent notable projects.

Mozilla Protocol

Building a robust design system spanning both web and product surfaces for the Mozilla and Firefox family of products.

Firefox Homepage

User Research, UX, and Design of a new download page for the Firefox Browser; optimized to increase session to download conversion rates.

WordPress Signup

User research, UX, and UI design for a modular testing framework for a more performant WordPress.com signup flow.

WordPress Dashboard

Research, UX, and UI design aimed at increasing retention and engagement post new user signup.

Readmill

Strategy, research, and UI design for an iOS reading app. Acquired by Dropbox in 2014.
